attributes.action: abolish the absurdly complicated tax credit system, and introduce a proper redistrubutive sliding scale of income tax including a progressively higher rate for people being paid over £200,000
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
It is simply inconceivable that a Labour government should tax people who are paid around £50,000 per year at the same rate as people who earn this amount every week or even every day. It is also important not to discourage people working for very little money to give up and go on benefits.
Also the ridiculously complicated tax credits should be abolished ASAP.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
